trans-unit.source: Reads an XML manifest file into an object representation.
trans-unit.target: Lê um arquivo de manifesto XML em uma representação de objeto.

trans-unit.source: Reads the specified manifest XML and returns an object representation.
trans-unit.target: Lê o XML de manifesto especificado e retorna uma representação do objeto.

trans-unit.source: Specifies an input stream.
trans-unit.target: Especifica um fluxo de entrada.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to preserve the input stream in the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.InputStream" /> property of the resulting manifest object.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se é necessário preservar o fluxo de entrada na propriedade <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.InputStream" /> do objeto de manifesto resultante.

trans-unit.source: Used by <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ManifestWriter" /> to reconstitute input which is not represented in the object representation.
trans-unit.target: Usado por <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ManifestWriter" /> para reconstituir a entrada que não é representada na representação do objeto.

trans-unit.source: Reads the specified manifest XML and returns an object representation.
trans-unit.target: Lê o XML de manifesto especificado e retorna uma representação do objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest" /> object representation of the manifest.
trans-unit.target: Uma representação do objeto <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest" /> do manifesto.

trans-unit.source: Can be cast to <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyManifest" />, <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest" />, or <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest" /> to access more specific functionality.
trans-unit.target: Pode ser convertido em <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyManifest" />, <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest" /> ou <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest" /> para acessar uma funcionalidade mais específica.

trans-unit.source: The fully qualified path name of the input file.
trans-unit.target: O nome de caminho totalmente qualificado do arquivo de entrada.

trans-unit.source: For example, the full path may be c:\directory\folder\filename.manifest.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o caminho completo pode ser c:\directory\folder\filename.manifest.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to preserve the input stream in the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.InputStream" /> property of the resulting manifest object.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se é necessário preservar o fluxo de entrada na propriedade <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.InputStream" /> do objeto de manifesto resultante.

trans-unit.source: Used by <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ManifestWriter" /> to reconstitute input which is not represented in the object representation.
trans-unit.target: Usado por <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ManifestWriter" /> para reconstituir a entrada que não é representada na representação do objeto.

trans-unit.source: Reads the specified manifest XML and returns an object representation.
trans-unit.target: Lê o XML de manifesto especificado e retorna uma representação do objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest" /> object representation of the manifest.
trans-unit.target: Uma representação do objeto <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest" /> do manifesto.

trans-unit.source: Can be cast to <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyManifest" />, <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest" />, or <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest" /> to access more specific functionality.
trans-unit.target: Pode ser convertido em <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyManifest" />, <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest" /> ou <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest" /> para acessar uma funcionalidade mais específica.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the expected type of the manifest.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o tipo esperado do manifesto.

trans-unit.source: Valid values are <see langword="AssemblyManifest" />, <see langword="ApplicationManifest" />, or <see langword="DeployManifest" />.
trans-unit.target: Os valores válidos são <see langword="AssemblyManifest" />, <see langword="ApplicationManifest" /> ou <see langword="DeployManifest" />.

trans-unit.source: Specifies an input stream.
trans-unit.target: Especifica um fluxo de entrada.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to preserve the input stream in the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.InputStream" /> property of the resulting manifest object.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se é necessário preservar o fluxo de entrada na propriedade <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.InputStream" /> do objeto de manifesto resultante.

trans-unit.source: Used by <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ManifestWriter" /> to reconstitute input which is not represented in the object representation.
trans-unit.target: Usado por <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ManifestWriter" /> para reconstituir a entrada que não é representada na representação do objeto.

trans-unit.source: Reads the specified manifest XML and returns an object representation.
trans-unit.target: Lê o XML de manifesto especificado e retorna uma representação do objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest" /> object representation of the manifest.
trans-unit.target: Uma representação do objeto <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest" /> do manifesto.

trans-unit.source: Can be cast to <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.AssemblyManifest" />, <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ApplicationManifest" />, or <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.DeployManifest" /> to access more specific functionality.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the expected type of the manifest.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o tipo esperado do manifesto.

trans-unit.source: Valid values are <see langword="AssemblyManifest" />, <see langword="ApplicationManifest" />, or <see langword="DeployManifest" />.
trans-unit.target: Os valores válidos são <see langword="AssemblyManifest" />, <see langword="ApplicationManifest" /> ou <see langword="DeployManifest" />.

trans-unit.source: The path name of the input file.
trans-unit.target: O nome do caminho do arquivo de entrada.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether to preserve the input stream in the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.InputStream" /> property of the resulting manifest object.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se é necessário preservar o fluxo de entrada na propriedade <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest.InputStream" /> do objeto de manifesto resultante.

trans-unit.target: Usado por <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ManifestWriter" /> para reconstituir a entrada que não é representada na representação do objeto.

trans-unit.target: Uma representação do objeto <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.Manifest" /> do manifesto.
